headline: Nvidia, Salesforce, Snowflakes, Warner Bros. Discovery, eBay: Stocks to watch today
summary: Most of the U.S. stocks declined on Thursday following President Donald Trump’s announcement that the tariffs on Canada and Mexico would proceed as planned on March 4.

raw.headline: Nvidia, Salesforce, Snowflakes, Warner Bros. Discovery, eBay: Stocks to watch today
raw.summary: Most of the U.S. stocks declined on Thursday following President Donald Trump’s announcement that the tariffs on Canada and Mexico would proceed as planned on March 4.

headline: Why eBay Stock Plunged Today
summary: Shares of e-commerce platform eBay (NASDAQ: EBAY) plunged on Thursday after the company reported financial results for the fourth quarter of 2024.  At noon ET, eBay stock was down by 7%, but it had been down as much as 11% earlier in the day.  Investors seem to be more disappointed, however, with eBay's guidance for the first quarter of 2025.

headline: eBay's Growth Story Intact? Analyst Sees Strength But Warns Of Tariff And FX Challenges
summary: eBay Inc. (NASDAQ:EBAY) shares are trading lower on Thursday following fourth-quarter results and soft first-quarter revenue guidance reported on Wednesday. The company reported earnings per share of $1.25, which beat the analyst consensus estimate of $1.20, and revenue of $2.579 billion marginally exceeded the analyst consensus estimate of $2.571 billion. headline: EBay Stock Sinks on Soft Revenue, Gross Merchandise Volume Outlook
summary: Shares of eBay fell Thursday, a day after the e-commerce marketplace issued current-quarter revenue and gross merchandise volume guidance that was weaker than analysts' estimates.

raw.headline: EBay Stock Sinks on Soft Revenue, Gross Merchandise Volume Outlook

headline: eBay, Rolls-Royce, Viatris: Market Minute
summary: Yahoo Finance anchor Brad Smith takes a closer look at the top stories affecting the market in today's Market Minute. eBay (EBAY) shares fall after its first quarter outlook fell short of expectations. Rolls-Royce Holdings (RYCEY) stock pops after the company issued stronger-than-expected guidance. Shares of Viatris (VTRS) plunge after its 2025 outlook disappointed investors. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute. This post was written by Naomi Buchanan.
